summary: This is an email chain from March 7, 2019, discussing a fresh court battle that could expose more details in Alex Acosta's controversial plea deal with Jeffrey Epstein. It mentions a call with Judge Cassell and a call with BJay Pak regarding an investigation.

persons.name: Alex Acosta
persons.context: Mentioned in the context of his controversial plea deal with Jeffrey Epstein, which is the subject of a fresh court battle.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the controversial plea deal with Alex Acosta that is being discussed.

persons.name: Judge Cassell
persons.context: The team has a call scheduled with him regarding the investigation into the plea deal.

persons.name: BJay Pak
persons.context: The team had a call with him to give a high-level overview of their investigation, which he appreciated.

connections.description: Acosta was involved in a controversial plea deal with Epstein as a former U.S. Attorney.
Both are legal professionals involved in the investigation and court proceedings related to the Epstein plea deal.

events.title: Call with BJay Pak
events.description: The team had a call with U.S. Attorney BJay Pak to give a high-level overview of their investigation into the Epstein plea deal.

events.title: Call with Judge Cassell
events.description: The team has a call scheduled with Judge Cassell regarding the investigation into the Epstein plea deal.

events.title: Politico article published
events.description: A Politico article was published detailing the fresh court battle that could expose more details in Alex Acosta's controversial Epstein plea deal.

keyFacts: A fresh court battle could expose more details in Alex Acosta's controversial plea deal with Jeffrey Epstein.
The team had a call with U.S. Attorney BJay Pak on March 7, 2019, to discuss their investigation.
The team has a call scheduled with Judge Cassell on March 8, 2019, regarding the investigation.
The email references a Politico article from March 6, 2019, about the plea deal.
